thread.title: EU moves toward unprecedented punishment for Poland

title: EU moves toward unprecedented punishment for Poland
text:
EU moves toward unprecedented punishment for Poland 3:08pm GMT - 01:29 
The European Union's parliament has passed a resolution in support of budget cuts and voting restrictions for Poland's nationalist government, on the same day a Holocaust law takes effect there that's been condemned by Israel and the United States.   
The European Union's parliament has passed a resolution in support of budget cuts and voting restrictions for Poland's nationalist government, on the same day a Holocaust law takes effect there that's been condemned by Israel and the United States.  //reut.rs/2oFBcj8
